Illustrate associations with scatterplots, bubble charts, correlation plots, and heatmaps

## Learning objectives

* Plot bubble charts to avoid overplotting in scatterplots
* Plot correlation plots and heatmaps to show multiple associations
* Add rugs and marginal histograms to scatterplots
